sentences: Kim Sozzi (born 1978) is an American dance-pop singer from Long Island, New York.
Sozzi grew up on Long Island.
Kim Sozzi's career began in 1999 when she signed a contract on Columbia Records for her first major album, Life Goes On.
"Feel Your Love" was released at the end of 2008, becoming Kim Sozzi's most successful single, peaking at No. 1 on the Billboard Dance Airplay Chart.
But You Can't Touch" for the WWE Divas Nikki and Brie, The Bella Twins, which is now solely attributed to Nikki.
"Break Up" - (from Just One Day) (No. 23 UK Singles Chart June 2007)
"Kiss Me Back" - (from Just One Day) (No. 1 Billboard Dance Charts 12/9/2009)
"Secret Love" - (from Just One Day) (No. 1 Billboard Dance Charts 2/22/2010)
